nodes.text: The pine was a tree that could be found in the forests of the planet Chandrila. During a meeting between former Rebellion heroes Lando Calrissian, Han Solo, and Leia Organa in 7 ABY, the fresh smell of pine and cedar trees mixed with the scent of the droid BX-778's cooking within the apartment owned by Solo and Organa.

The pine was first mentioned in the Star Wars canon in the 2018 novel Last Shot, written by Daniel José Older. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, pine trees first appeared in the 1984 young readers' book How the Ewoks Saved the Trees: An Old Ewok Legend by James Howe.
